mapper.select: SELECT pi.name as product_name, p.price, p.cost, p.exp, st.name as store_name ,s.qnt, s.sales_date, c.name as category_name,c.id as category_id FROM sales s INNER JOIN store_product sp on sp.id = s.store_product_id INNER JOIN product p on p.id = sp.product_id INNER JOIN product_info pi on pi.product_code = p.product_info_id INNER JOIN store st on st.id = sp.store_id INNER JOIN category c on c.id = pi.category_id WHERE store_id = #{store_id};

SELECT p.price, p.cost,c.id as category_id , c.name as category_name,s.qnt,pi.name FROM sales s INNER JOIN store_product sp on sp.id = s.store_product_id INNER JOIN product p on p.id = sp.product_id INNER JOIN product_info pi on pi.product_code = p.product_info_id INNER JOIN store st on st.id = sp.store_id INNER JOIN category c on c.id = pi.category_id
